effect.minecraft.absorption.desc: §8| Adds additional hearts that can not be regenerated
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.desc: §8| Causes an illager raid to start upon entering a village
effect.minecraft.blindness.desc: §8| Reduces the visibility, ability to sprint and critical hit
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.desc: §8| Increases underwater visibility, mining speed and prevents drowning
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: §8| Gives discounts on trades, and makes villagers throw gifts
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.desc: §8| Damages the affected entity, heals undead
effect.minecraft.instant_health.desc: §8| Heals the affected entity, damages undead
effect.minecraft.invisibility.desc: §8| Grants invisibility and reduces mobs' detection range
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.desc: §8| Increases jump height and reduces fall damage
effect.minecraft.luck.desc: §8| Can increase chances of valuable loot
effect.minecraft.nausea.desc: §8| Wobbles and warps the affected entity
effect.minecraft.night_vision.desc: §8| Grants the ability to see well in darkness and underwater
effect.minecraft.poison.desc: §8| Inflicts damage over time, but not to death
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.desc: §8| Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage
effect.minecraft.unluck.desc: §8| Can reduce chances of valuable loot
effect.minecraft.weaving.desc: §8| Leaves a cobweb upon the death
effect.minecraft.wind_charged.desc: §8| Shoots a wind charge upon the death
